                        throws java.sql.SQLException
        Counts the unread messages a user has.
        Parameters:
        user_id - The logged in user.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the user has at least one unread message.

        java.sql.SQLException

                                                          throws java.sql.SQLException

        Parameters:
        receiver_id - The id of a user who shall be the receiver of the given messages.
